intent_template: Find me {{category}} that are of the same brand as the product in this picture. It needs to {{description}}.
intent: Find me shoes that are of the same brand as the product in this picture. It needs to be less than 70 dollars.

program_html.locator: lambda:(() => { res = parseFloat(document.querySelector("#maincontent > div.columns > div > div.product-info-main > div.product-info-price > div.price-box.price-final_price > span > span").outerText.substr(1)); return res ? res : 0; })()
lambda:(() => { try { return document.querySelector('#maincontent > div.page-title-wrapper.product > h1 > span').textContent } catch (e) { return '' }})()
